doc.title: Ayrilik
doc.plot: Suna is a singer in a night club. Her boss Vural fancies her and wants them to be together. As Suna wants to escape from him, she meets Murat, a gambler. Murat is escaping from a gang because of a gambling debt. They fall in love with each other. Vural doesn't give up on Suna and urges her to marry him, as otherwise he would kill her lover. Suna, in order to save Murat, accepts marrying Vural. As Murat constantly gambles in Vural's casino, Vural offers him a position there and Murat becomes the manager of Vural's casino. One day, Vural understands that Suna and Murat were lovers. Suna and Murat tell Vural their love to each other. He acts as if he has accepted the situation and says that he has agreed to divorce Suna. When they go out for a final dinner with Suna, Vural's men has already killed Murat. On the way back, Vural drives the car madly in order to kill Suna and himself in an accident.
